document.docAuthor: Xiao, Hui, Sun, Lei, Jiao, Tianyang & Li, Zi
document.masterDocTitle: A revision of Chinese species of Mesopolobus Westwood (Hymenoptera: Pteromalidae) with descriptions of four new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of Chinese species of Mesopolobus Westwood (Hymenoptera: Pteromalidae) with descriptions of four new species from China

paragraph.heading:
Mesopolobus prasinus (Walker, 1834)
New record to China
( Fig. 17 )

treatmentCitationGroup.paragraph:
Platyterma prasinum Walker, 1834a: 305
, Lectotype ♀ , BMNH (Examined, B.M. TYPE HYM 5.1826);
Graham, 1957: 221
.

Biology. This species was reared from
Agropyron repens
(L.) ( Rosen, 1966 ). Herting (1976) stated that the species parasitic on
Oscinella frit
(L.) and
Rabdophaga dubia (Kieffer)
( Diptera ). Two females of our specimens were reared from
Polychrosis cunninghamiacola Liu & Bai
, and one female was collected from
Yponomeuta
sp. ( Lepidoptera ).
Comments. It is firstly recorded from Oriental Region.

Distribution. China ( Jilin , Liaoning , Beijing , Hebei , Shandong , Shaanxi , Gansu , Qinghai , Xinjiang , Zhejiang , Hubei , Jiangxi , Hunan , Sichuan , Fujian , Tibet ); Palearctic Region ( Noyes, 2014 ).
